```{r}
library(coda)
library(rjags)
```



```{r}
nobs = 30

y = rnorm(nobs,1,1)

niter = 15000
nburn = 5000
nadapt = 5000

mydata=list(n=nobs, y=y)

myinit=list(tau=1,beta0=0)

mymodel = "model{
#likelihood
for(i in 1:n){
y[i] ~ dnorm(mu[i], tau)
mu[i]=beta0
}

#prior
tau ~ dgamma(3,3)
beta0 ~ dnorm(0,1)


}"
```

```{r}
fit1 = jags.model(textConnection(mymodel), data=mydata
                  ,inits=myinit, n.chains=1, n.adapt=nadapt)
fit.samples=coda.samples(fit1, c("tau", "beta0"), n.iter=niter)
summary(fit.samples)
```
